title: FS T206 Johnny Evers Portrait EPDG Back SGC 4.5 **Sold**
author: Santo10Fan

posts.post_title: FS T206 Johnny Evers Portrait EPDG Back SGC 4.5 **Sold**
posts.post_content:
Selling this nicely focused and centered T206 Johnny Evers portrait with a tough, clean EPDG back. Based on populations of PSA and SGC, I peg this combo at less than 3% submitted. The red really stands out on the back and doesn't show fading.

SOLD USPS Priority Paypal FF, (G&S w/fees), Venmo, Zelle. Earliest timestamps on PMs or this thread of "Sold" take precedence.

That’s a very nice card.  Wish I could afford it.

Cheers Zach
